definition.procedurexml: <xml xmlns="https://developers.google.com/blockly/xml"><block type="event_trigger" deletable="false" x="40" y="40"><field name="trigger">No additional trigger</field><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.9</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="spawn_xporb"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="xpamount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">10</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">XP Bonus Activated</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">block.note.bell</field><comment pinned="false" h="51" w="187">This plays a sound each time the procedure is run.</comment><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.9</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="explode"><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="power"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">EarthQuake Activated</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">block.note.bell</field><comment pinned="false" h="51" w="187">This plays a sound each time the procedure is run.</comment><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement><next><block type="controls_if"><comment pinned="false" h="85" w="293">This example will test if the random number is less than 0.7 (70%). Random numbers range between (0.0 and 1.0). If it is true, then it will run what is in the "do" section of the if statement.</comment><value name="IF0"><block type="math_binary_ops"><field name="OP">LT</field><value name="A"><block type="math_java_constants"><field name="CONSTANT">RANDOM</field></block></value><value name="B"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0.9</field></block></value></block></value><statement name="DO0"><block type="item_set_damage"><value name="item"><block type="itemstack_to_mcitem"/></value><value name="amount"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">0</field></block></value><next><block type="entity_send_chat"><value name="text"><block type="text"><field name="TEXT">Full Repair Activated</field></block></value><value name="entity"><block type="entity_from_deps"/></value><value name="actbar"><block type="logic_boolean"><field name="BOOL">TRUE</field></block></value><next><block type="play_sound"><field name="sound">block.note.bell</field><comment pinned="false" h="51" w="187">This plays a sound each time the procedure is run.</comment><value name="x"><block type="coord_x"/></value><value name="y"><block type="coord_y"/></value><value name="z"><block type="coord_z"/></value><value name="level"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value><value name="pitch"><block type="math_number"><field name="NUM">1</field></block></value></block></next></block></next></block></statement></block></next></block></next></block></next></block></xml>
